A: 1. The color of grass is (a) red (b) green (c) yellow
2. A cat says (a) woof (b) meow (c) moo
3. True or False: Fish live in water
4. The number of fingers on one hand is (a) three (b) five (c) ten
5. A square has (a) three (b) four (c) five sides
6. The sun rises in the (a) west (b) north (c) east
7. A bicycle has (a) one (b) two (c) three wheels
8. True or False: An apple is a fruit
9. The opposite of hot is (a) warm (b) cold (c) cool
10. A bird has (a) fur (b) scales (c) feathers
11. The capital of France is (a) Rome (b) Paris (c) Berlin
12. True or False: A triangle has four sides
13. The color of the sky on a clear day is (a) green (b) blue (c) black
14. A cow gives us (a) eggs (b) milk (c) wool
15. The largest ocean is the (a) Atlantic (b) Indian (c) Pacific
16. True or False: Spiders are insects
17. The season after spring is (a) autumn (b) winter (c) summer
18. A doctor helps people who are (a) happy (b) sick (c) hungry
19. The planet we live on is (a) Mars (b) Earth (c) Venus
20. True or False: A square is a circle
21. The color of a stop sign is (a) blue (b) red (c) yellow
22. A baker bakes (a) shoes (b) bread (c) cars
23. The number of days in a week is (a) five (b) seven (c) ten
24. True or False: A book is for reading
25. The animal that barks is a (a) cat (b) dog (c) bird
26. The opposite of up is (a) side (b) down (c) over
27. A tree has (a) roots (b) fins (c) wings
28. True or False: Ice is frozen water
29. The color of snow is (a) black (b) white (c) grey
30. A pilot flies an (a) boat (b) train (c) airplane
31. The number of months in a year is (a) ten (b) twelve (c) fourteen
32. True or False: A fish can walk
33. The sound a lion makes is a (a) roar (b) hiss (c) chirp
34. The tool used to cut paper is (a) hammer (b) scissors (c) wrench
35. The largest land animal is the (a) elephant (b) whale (c) giraffe
36. True or False: The moon is a star
37. The color of a banana is (a) red (b) yellow (c) orange
38. A chef cooks (a) clothes (b) food (c) houses
39. The number of hours in a day is (a) twelve (b) twenty (c) twenty-four
40. True or False: A car has wings
41. The animal that says "moo" is a (a) pig (b) cow (c) sheep
42. The season when leaves fall is (a) spring (b) summer (c) autumn
43. A teacher works in a (a) hospital (b) school (c) factory
44. True or False: The sun is cold
45. The color of a fire truck is (a) blue (b) red (c) green
46. A farmer grows (a) buildings (b) crops (c) cars
47. The number of minutes in an hour is (a) thirty (b) sixty (c) ninety
48. True or False: A snake has legs
49. The animal that hops is a (a) fish (b) rabbit (c) bear
50. The opposite of day is (a) morning (b) evening (c) night
B: 1. What color is a ripe banana_________?
2. How many legs does a cat have_________?
3. What is the name of our planet_________?
4. What animal lays eggs and has feathers_________?
C: 3. What is one common use for wood?
4. State one benefit of drinking water.
